tpl.dbms

Interface Transaction

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    TransactionImpl

    public interface Transaction
extends java.lang.Runnable
    Represents a database transaction.
    Author:
    alangr28

    • Method Detail

      • addOperation

        void addOperation(Operation operation)
        Inserts the operation into transaction's pending tasks. The Transaction object must process all operations in the order they were added.
        Parameters:
        operation - the operation to add

      • getTimeStamp

        int getTimeStamp()
        Returns:
        transaction timestamp

        Returns:
        the transaction identifier
